name: Cin Cin Brunch Dinner&Wine
description: A chic and stylish spot for Italian-inspired brunch, dinner, and an extensive wine selection.

name: Homm
description: Cozy Thai dining experience focusing on aromatic, authentic, and home-style recipes.

name: Baiyoke Buffet
description: Famous international buffet in the Baiyoke Sky Hotel, offering stunning panoramic views of Bangkok.

name: Bar B Q Plaza
description: A popular Mongolian-style barbecue chain in Thailand, famous for its unique grill pan and signature sauce.

name: Mo-Mo-Paradise
description: Authentic all-you-can-eat Japanese shabu-shabu and sukiyaki with high-quality meats and fresh vegetables.

name: Suki Teenoi BBQ
description: An incredibly popular and affordable Thai-style suki buffet, beloved for its great value and late-night hours.

name: Sushiro
description: Japan's number one conveyor belt sushi chain, offering a wide variety of fresh and affordable sushi.

name: Netflix at Home
description: The ultimate private dining experience featuring your favorite snacks, a comfy couch, and endless entertainment.
